text: @NYGovCuomo More people died with coronavirus in New York City (population 8 million) than Texas (29 mil), Florida (21 mil), California (39 mil) and Georgia (11 mil) … combined and Cuomo wants everyone to forget that FACT! Instead twitters about a stupid poster.
